original_text: When the soldiers were taking Jesus out to that place, a man called Simon was there. He was coming in from outside the city. He was from the city of Cyrene, and he was the father of Alexander and Rufus. The soldiers told Simon that he must carry Jesus' cross.
korean_text: 마침 알렉산더와 루포의 아버지인 구레네 사람 시몬이 시골로부터 와서 지나가는데 그들이 그를 억지로 같이 가게 하여 예수의 십자가를 지우고

sentences.original_text: When the soldiers were taking Jesus out to that place,
a man called Simon was there.
He was coming in from outside the city.
He was from the city of Cyrene,
and he was the father of Alexander and Rufus.
The soldiers told Simon that he must carry Jesus' cross.
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들은 시몬에게 예수님의 십자가를 지고 가야 한다고 말했습니다.
